yaml_deprecation.title: Legacy YAML configuration detected {name}.
yaml_deprecation.description: The device (MAC: {mac}, Host: {host}) is configured in configuration.yaml. The Orvibo integration now supports UI-based configuration and this device has been migrated to the new UI. Please remove the YAML block from configuration.yaml to avoid future issues.

yaml_deprecation_import_issue.title: Legacy YAML configuration import issue for {name}
yaml_deprecation_import_issue.description: Attempting to import this device (MAC: {mac}, Host: {host}) from YAML has an issue. Please try reloading the integration, or removing the YAML block from configuration.yaml and creating the entry using the UI.

update_error.message: Error while fetching state for S20 {name}.

progress.title: Orvibo S20
progress.start_discovery:
Attempting to discover new S20 switches

This will take about 5-10 seconds

discovery_failed.title: Discovery failed
discovery_failed.description: No S20 switches were discovered on the network.
